next_jobs.title: Catalog Global News/Finance APIs
next_jobs.instructions: List and verify accessible APIs for global financial/news data. Output to config/news_sources.yaml.

next_jobs.title: Implement News Arbitrage Engine
next_jobs.instructions: Create src/engines/arbitrage_news.py to parse news feeds and flag arbitrage opportunities.

next_jobs.title: Implement FX Arbitrage Engine
next_jobs.instructions: Build src/engines/arbitrage_fx.py to detect FX rate discrepancies across markets.

next_jobs.title: Implement Social Sentiment Engine
next_jobs.instructions: Develop src/engines/arbitrage_social.py for secondary sentiment-based signals.

next_jobs.title: Automate Engine Logging
next_jobs.instructions: Configure all engines to log outputs to data/arbitrage_signals/YYYYMMDD.csv and errors to ops/logs/AUTORUN_LOG.md.

next_jobs.title: Draft ROI Plan
next_jobs.instructions: Summarize revenue engine logic and prioritization in agent_results/ROI_PLAN.md.
